game.name: Mechs V Kaijus - Tower Defense
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mechs V Kaijus is an addictive hardcore tower defense gameplay. In Mechs V Kaijus you take on the role of Commander of a powerful Mechs squadron. Improve your Mech, strategically place towers and factories on the battlefield. Deploy support units on the battlefield, and save our civilization.
